column1: The Pit Room////Excellent BBQ restaurant. The brisket and pork ribs were tender
column2: smoky and full of flavor. I don't normally care for okra
column3: but their grilled okra was delicious. The elote is a side dish of corn kernels with seasonings topped with a white creamy cheese
column4: cilantro and spicy sauce that was very tasty. The staff was friendly and helpful.
